name: Garlic Croutons
preparation: Place bread on Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner or parchment paper.
In a mixing bowl, combine olive oil, garlic, and Herb & Garlic Dip Mix. Drizzle over bread and toss to coat.
Bake for 10 minutes, tossing once. Remove from oven, and sprinkle with Parmesan.

products.name: Herb & Garlic Dip Mix
summary: Classic notes of chives, parsley, & garlic.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
